messages.content: ü•≠ Welcome to Mango Paradise! Your premium destination for the finest Pakistani mangoes.

messages.caption: Fresh, juicy mangoes directly from our orchards!

messages.content:
üåü We offer:
‚Ä¢ Premium quality mangoes
‚Ä¢ Direct from farms
‚Ä¢ Nationwide delivery
‚Ä¢ Competitive prices
‚Ä¢ Multiple varieties in one order

messages.caption: See how we carefully pack your mangoes!

messages.content: üõí Ready to order? Let's get started with our main menu!

chaunsa.name: Chaunsa
chaunsa.quality: Premium quality Chaunsa mangoes, sweet and juicy, perfect for the season. Hand-picked from the finest orchards.

sindhri.name: Sindhri
sindhri.quality: Authentic Sindhri mangoes with rich flavor and smooth texture. Known for their distinctive taste and aroma.

anwar_ratol.name: Anwar Ratol
anwar_ratol.quality: Exquisite Anwar Ratol mangoes, considered the king of mangoes. Exceptionally sweet with a unique flavor profile.

langra.name: Langra
langra.quality: Traditional Langra mangoes with unique taste and texture. A favorite among mango connoisseurs.

dussehri.name: Dussehri
dussehri.quality: Sweet and aromatic Dussehri mangoes, known for their small size and intense flavor.

gulab_khasa.name: Gulab Khasa
gulab_khasa.quality: Sweet and aromatic Dussehri mangoes, known for their small size and intense flavor.

saroli.name: Saroli
saroli.quality: Sweet and aromatic Dussehri mangoes, known for their small size and intense flavor.

banganapalli.name: Banganapalli
banganapalli.quality: Sweet and aromatic Dussehri mangoes, known for their small size and intense flavor.

zafran.name: Zafran
zafran.quality: Sweet and aromatic Dussehri mangoes, known for their small size and intense flavor.

message.english:
‚ùì **Help / FAQs**

**Q: How long does delivery take?**
A: 2-3 business days within city, 3-5 days outside city.

**Q: Do you deliver nationwide?**
A: Yes, we deliver all over Pakistan.

**Q: What if mangoes are damaged?**
A: We provide 100% replacement guarantee.

**Q: Can I cancel my order?**
A: Yes, within 2 hours of placing order.

**Q: Do you provide bulk discounts?**
A: Yes, 5% discount on orders above 10 crates.

**Q: Can I order multiple varieties?**
A: Yes! You can add multiple mango varieties to your cart in a single order.

üìû **Contact:** 03112246528
